Fyi @John Simon you marked https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/87264 as waiting on author 3 times, but the author had already rebased and squashed.
Aagh. I’ll try to be more careful in the future, but it’s taking me four hours to run through all of these on a Sunday night. :frown:
